name: VIRTUAL CONFERENCE ON IOT AND INTELLIGENT APPS
content: Breaking Down The Complexities Of IoT Technology, Elucidating Its Vast & Largely Untapped Potential & Promoting Its Foray Into The Future'. IOT and Intelligent Apps will be a key factor for designing our near global future. We are in appropriate time to host this conference, build a cohesive environment to catalyst the research, developments on the recent trends towards the IOT and Intelligent Apps.
